009package imagingbook.common.mser.components;
010
011import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
012import java.io.PrintStream;
013
014public abstract class Util {
015        
016//      public static int WAIT_TIME_MS = 500;
017        static int INDENT = 4;
018        
019        
020        //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
021        
022        // print forest with multiple roots
023        public static String toStringRecursive(ComponentTree<?> rt) { 
024                ByteArrayOutputStream os = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
025                PrintStream ps = new PrintStream(os);
026                
027                for (Component<?> c : rt) {
028                        if (c.getParent() == null || c.getParent() == c) {      // start at any root
029                                printToStreamRecursive(c, ps, 0);
030                        }       
031                }       
032                return os.toString();
033        }
034        
035        // print tree with a single root
036        public static String toStringRecursive(Component<?> rt) { 
037                ByteArrayOutputStream os = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
038                PrintStream ps = new PrintStream(os);
039                printToStreamRecursive(rt, ps, 0);      
040                return os.toString();
041        }
042        
043        
044        private static void printToStreamRecursive(Component<?> c, PrintStream ps, int indent) {
045                for (int i=0; i < indent; i++) {
046                        ps.append('|');
047                        for (int j = 0; j < INDENT; j++) {
048                                ps.append(' ');
049                        }
050                }
051                c.printToStream(ps);
052                ps.println();
053                for (Component<?> child : c.getChildren()) {
054                        printToStreamRecursive(child, ps, indent + 1);
055                }
056        }
057        
058        //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
059        
060//      public static Roi makeEllipseRoi(Ellipse e) {
061//              Ellipse2D oval = new Ellipse2D.Double(-e.ra, -e.rb, 2*e.ra, 2*e.rb);
062//              AffineTransform trans = new AffineTransform();
063//              
064//              trans.translate(e.xc + 0.5, e.yc + 0.5);
065//              trans.rotate(e.theta);
066//              
067//              Shape s = trans.createTransformedShape(oval);
068//              Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(s);      
069//              return roi;
070//      }
071
072}
